article_title: No Offense Honey, I'm Filing My Taxes Separately

article_metadata.description: 95% of married couples file taxes jointly, but it can be a mistake. Separate filing usually costs only slightly more and can prevent much bigger tax problems down the road.
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: 95% of married couples file taxes jointly, but it can be a mistake. Separate filing usually costs only slightly more and can prevent much bigger tax problems down the road.
